sage.audio

Class NIterationSound

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.audio.Sound
      • sage.audio.NIterationSound

  • public class NIterationSound
extends Sound
    This class extends Sound. It represents a sound with more specific behavior than a typical sound. NIterationSound is a sound that replays itself a specific number of times.
    Author:
    Kenneth Barnett
